text: Biwiyon ke darmiyan poora poora adal karna tumhare bas mein nahin hai, tum chaho bhi to ispar qaadir nahin ho sakte, lihaza (kanoon e ilahi ka mansha poora karne ke liye yeh kafi hai ke) ek biwi ki taraf is tarah na jhuk jao ke dusri ko adhar latakta (in suspense) chodh do. Agar tum apna tarz e amal durust rakkho aur Allah se darte raho to Allah chashm poshi (All-Forgiving) karne wala aur reham farmane wala hai
